name: h3
description: The 2026 Louisville Slugger Atlas BBCOR Baseball Bat is engineered for both contact and power hitters, featuring a balanced swing feel that caters to diverse playing styles. Its one-piece alloy construction includes a 2 5/8 inch EVOKE Alloy Barrel, optimized with a precision wall design for enhanced performance. The bat's Turned Mass Damper significantly reduces hand vibration, while the SPD-Gen3 End Cap maximizes barrel performance for a more powerful hit. Finished in a striking black and teal colorway, the bat also boasts a Pro Design Knob Taper for improved comfort and control, complemented by the Premium LS Pro Comfort Grip for superior tack and cushion. BBCOR .50 Certified, this bat is approved for high school and college play, making it a top choice for serious athletes. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
